comments.body: I would definitely add to the documentation that Walk follows symlinks by default though.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +400,404 @@  Yields:
    # Each yield is a 3-tuple:  the pathname of a directory, followed
    # by lists of all its subdirectories and leaf files.
    (dirname, [subdirname, subdirname, ...], [filename, filename, ...])
  """
